## Load data

## EDA for Presentation

```{r gganimate-gdp-over-time}
p <- african_gdps %>%
  mutate(
    year = as.integer(year)
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = gdp)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 100)

p <- p + 
  transition_time(year) +
  labs(title = "African GDP Distribution",
       subtitle = "Year: {frame_time}") + 
  view_follow()

```
